title: Portion of URC falling under No Development Zone, Buffer Zone, CRZ-I & III and Private Forest shall form a part of the required Recreational Area in the URS
clause_text: Portion of URC falling under No Development Zone, Buffer Zone, CRZ-I & III and Private Forest shall form a part of the required Recreational Area in the URS.
